title: Sovereign Wealth Funds Join Clamor for Private Credit in EMs
description: A record wave of private credit deals across emerging markets looks set to extend this year, with a host of institutional and sovereign wealth investors seeking to diversify their US-focused portfolios.
content: A record wave of private credit deals across emerging markets looks set to extend this year, with a host of institutional and sovereign wealth investors seeking to diversify their US-focused portfolios.
